Negative_Review: Location is far from the popular points of Paris 15 30 minute cab ride to most spots My adapter for the wall outlet disappeared after my room was serviced My room was overcharged incorrectly and now they want me to supply my bank account information for a refund Sloppy
Positive_Review: The indoor and outdoor pools are fantastic perfect for both lounging or serious lap swimming There is a park nearby for walking biking or running The food is pretty good Friendly staff

Negative_Review: The fact that guests can only use the pool until noon the day of their departure is unacceptable considering the expensive price tag of the hotel
Positive_Review: The pool and the resort feeling

Negative_Review: The first morning the power went out which included AC to room Basically the only reason I was staying there Elevators didn t work The only thing that functioned was room keys Staff was clueless although nice and no extras offered as consolation Luckily they got it sorted in a few hours but I was disappointed in the inconvenience
Positive_Review: I live in town but Booked a 2 night stay during a massive heatwave Enjoyed the AC when working and pool

Negative_Review: We had a really bad experience and do not recommend the hotel at all It s only advantage is the large pool in the middle but everything else is horrible designed and highly overpriced Please don t stay there if you want to have a quiet and relaxed holiday experience You will not get it
Positive_Review: No Positive

Negative_Review: The shower room my husband had to wipe up the water from all over the floor after every shower as it was totally unsuitable for a disabled person with walking balance problems
Positive_Review: The friendliness and helpfulness of all the staff food very good

Negative_Review: The personal belongings disappear from the room The party in the restaurant went till 0130 AM and the sound proofing in the room couldn t handle it There is no clear info warning how to get to the hotel on the day of the local sporting events due to closure of the local roads
Positive_Review: Two big pools choice of parking staff

Negative_Review: too warm blanket was replaced by the service on request very small table wrong position of the lamp over the table one strikes his head against the lamp over and over again and the reading lamp over the bed which was very difficult to switch on and off
Positive_Review: 2 swimming pools with good length and the possibility to use them from 7 a m to 10 p m

Negative_Review: The location was perfect for me near where my meetings were but if you re visiting purely for sightseeing the classic Eiffel Notre Dame etc there are better closer locations
Positive_Review: Swimming outdoors in the winter in the middle of Paris No problem There is a massive warm swimming pool and the indoor one is really good too There s plenty of art all over the hotel The food was amazing

Negative_Review: You always need a taxi to get there It is far from the metro and the bus does not have a great route for tourists
Positive_Review: The rooms are great the staff very helpful the brakefeast excellent and the swimming pool exceptional

Negative_Review: incompetent staff no access to the lounge chairs at the pool 3 days in a row chaos at breakfast
Positive_Review: beds architecture size of the room restaurant on the roof top

Negative_Review: The only small niggle was the air conditioning that we didn t manage to set to a comfortable temperature
Positive_Review: Fabulous pools both inside and out Beds were very comfortable and we loved the room decor which was a mix of modern and art deco Staff were welcoming and friendly and we would definitely stay again

Negative_Review: no chance of getting a propper chair at the swimming pool overcrowded with the club members from the neighbourhood who get priority complete chaos at breakfast arrogance of the team lack of management
Positive_Review: roof terrasse restaurant good food and excellent service incredible view comfort of the beds size of the room

Negative_Review: Awful circulation in the hotel Confusing mix of members clients external visitors No quiet space for hotel clients only Rooms very small Mood around the pool nervous people to get a decent spot and show of Long wait at restaurant for ok food only Very poor breakfast experience
Positive_Review: Definitely not a 5 star hotel More like a club med for blas Parisians but friendly staff Beautiful swimming pool

Negative_Review: The service Often poor with the odd exceptional member of staff but overall not of level expected for class of hotel
Positive_Review: Great pool and hotel facilities Comfy rooms excellent bathroom and lovely view of pool

Negative_Review: 10 00 breakfast finish On departure day after 3 days it would have been nice to use pool beyond 14 00 flight at 21 00
Positive_Review: Great hotel immaculate cleanliness smells Clinic fabulous rooftop restaurant and staff fantastic Breakfast finished at 10 00 an extra 30 minutes would have been better for those on a relaxing break

Negative_Review: The hotel did not have the extra bed prepared on check in for our son even though it was in the booking It was also very expensive would have liked to be recognised as returning guests we stayed there at the same time last year

Negative_Review: breakfast needs an upgrade very simple
Positive_Review: luxurious hotel with perfect spa and swimming pool I stayed there just for relaxation few days from everything and it did the job perfectly

Negative_Review: I completely enjoyed the experience
Positive_Review: Loved the location good to be out of central Paris but we could get to any place we needed very easily Love the decor Restaurant is very nice and the staff is very courteous I don t speak French unfortunately but the English skills of the staff are very good

Negative_Review: Restaurant and food options are very poor for such a nice place Staff has a good attitude but has not the experience nor the reactivty of a 5 star hotel We went to have dinner on the tapar bar on the terrace they had no more meat left and it is supposed to be a grill bbq tapas bar The service was also very slow and unorganized Drinks come after the dishes i ask for an ash tray and the waiter points me the next table and says you got it there Anyway with some simple training and internal organsation everything can be resolved The place is really nice and great things to offer considering its location

Negative_Review: Wish it was more inside Paris can take a long time to go from there to the heart of Paris
